1659350.name: RPG Maker MZ - Heroine Character Generator for MZ
1659350.description:
Creators seeking their next brave female character for their upcoming RPG need to look no further! The new Heroine Character Generator by Gee Kun Soft allows you to select from multiple options for creating your star. Choose from various clothing, eye and hair styles in order to perfectly stylize your heroine or cast of heroines! With over 250 assets, you will have all the right pieces for generating your ideal Heroine that will be set for exploring your newly created world!

Features:

* Clothes ("fantasy" style) = 20
* Eyes = 5 sets
* Front Hair = 5 Female
* Rear Hair = 5 Female

* Compatible with RPG Maker MZ

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1659350.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
